content: Hello, I need some help with my home's heating system.
Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. Before we proceed, may I have your name please?
This is Martha. But I think I might have the wrong number; I was trying to call my grandson.
Thank you for letting me know, Martha. I will mark this as a wrong number so you won't be contacted again. If you ever need home services, please feel free to reach out to us.
reason: Customer confirmed contacting the wrong number
